english.segment1: Little girl fourteen flipping through a magazine. Says she wants to look that way. But her hair isn't straight, her body isn't fake. And she's always felt overweight
english.segment2: Well, little girl fourteen I wish that you could see. That beauty is within your heart. And you were made with such care, your skin, your body and your hair. Are perfect just the way they are
english.segment3: There could never be a more beautiful you. Don't buy the lies, disguises and hoops, they make you jump through. You were made to fill a purpose that only you could do. So there could never be a more beautiful you
english.segment4: Little girl twenty one the things that you've already done. Anything to get ahead. And you say you've got a man but He's got another plan. Only wants what you will do instead
english.segment5: Well, little girl twenty one you never thought that this would come. You starve yourself to play the part. But I can promise you there's a man whose love is true. And He'll treat you like the jewel you are
